name: ConsensusMonky Pool
description: consensusMONKY is a secure, reliable and transparent Cardano stake pool. Our pool is located in Germany and is connected with other nodes in the US and in Australia. As a professional software engineer and a cardano enthusiast since August 2017, I'm offering you a stake pool with german reliability and 24/7 support. On main net we will offer smart contract services and general crypto support.
